Chronic Parkinson's disease, which has long made it almost impossible to

implant method

Patients can now walk

this method, a
neuroprosthesis consisting of an electrode field is applied
to the patient's device and the device is
trained with an electrical pulse generator under the

Sailors far from home during the

British Royal Navy put the letters in the
